721434f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 71st Street
721434f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, west side, at 71st Street. In foregIOund may be
seen Presbyterian Hospital, which has just been wrecked. On
N.E. corner of 71st Street is St. James Episcopal Church.
June 8, 1928.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

1557968-a.title: 865 Madison Avenue - East 71st Street
1557968-a.folder: 865 Madison Avenue - East 71st Street, Manhattan, NY

721433f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 71st Street
721433f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, east side, at 7lst Street, showing St. James Protestant
Episcopal Church, erected on this site in 1884. Since that time
a few alterations, such as the addition of the belfrey, have been
made.
On the S.E. corner of 71st Street is the clearing resulting from
demolition of the old Presbyte ian Hospital. The Presbyterian
Nurses' Home is shown on the north side of 71st Street, adjoining
the church.
June 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
